name: addalias
text: Add alias %1 to global alias file\nCommand: %2
shortDescription: Add alias to the global alias file /etc/bash_alias
longDescription: By using a bash script, this block allows for alias's to be added to the global alias file, located at /etc/bash_alias. To avoid duplication, please only add alias's on first boot, unless you know what your doing. Please make sure to also run the 'aliassetup' block in first boot
